title: Waymos Froze, Blocked Traffic During San Francisco Power Outage
description: Waymoâ€™s driverless ride services were a high-profile victim of a power outage that affected large swaths of San Francisco, with cars freezing mid-ride across the city and disrupting traffic.

title: Permira, Warburg Agree to Buy Clearwater Analytics for $8.4 Billion
description: A group of private equity firms led by Permira and Warburg Pincus has agreed to acquire Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc. in a deal valuing the investment and accounting software maker at $8.4 billion including debt.

title: OpenAI Sees Better Margins on Business Sales, Report Says
description: OpenAI has squeezed better margins out of its paid products this year, as it races to maintain its pole position in artificial intelligence, according to a report in The Information.
